name: places/ChIJzRDsNvxYwokRFFko97vtuME
formattedAddress: 12 W 48th St Suite 307, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 W 48th St Suite 307, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
I'm shouting my love from the rooftops because, honestly, I can't contain my enthusiasm! This review is a love letter to Gabriel, the one who rescued me from the depths of bad haircuts and transformed my life!

I found myself stuck in a cycle of disappointment with traditional stylists who seemed to be stuck in a rut of monotonous trims and mundane bangs. Enter Gabriel, and my world changed! His skills are beyond magical; he doesn't just cut hair, he crafts masterpieces sculpting every strand of hair with precision and artistry.  My thick hair has never experienced such movement and life! Literally, my hair looks like a stunning display of peacock feathers, laying beautifully and effortlessly.

I can't express my gratitude enough; Gabriel, if you're reading this, know that you're not just a stylist to me, you're a Rock Star Hair God and I hope my hair grows at the speed of light so I can you see soon!

Shifting the spotlight to another dimension of excellence at the salon, I want to share my fantastic experience with Amy and Luiza. These two young ladies are absolute gems—always attentive, offering refreshments and snacks with genuine warmth. Beyond their outstanding hospitality, they shared valuable tips on navigating NYC and recommended some fantastic places to eat. I've never been to a salon and experienced the level of attention. They truly made my visit extraordinary and I can’t wait to come back!

originalText.text: If there's one professional in New York that I have complete confidence is the Brazilian hairstylist Tony Motta. He can do whatever he wants with my hair because I'm 100% sure that it will be perfect. All his work is made with love, attention and a huge knowledge. I just have to thank him and his team for so much dedication every time I go to Sahag. Love you Tony!!!! You're the best!!!

originalText.text: Tony is AN ARTIST. He goes beyond styling hair, he transforms his client's confidence levels through every balayage, cut and style. He is meticulous and passionate about every strand of hair he colors and cuts. I have been going to Tony and this salon for years now and absolutely LOVE IT. It is a clean beautiful space and all of the staff is super friendly!! Would recommend to everyone!

originalText.text: GABRIEL IS THE BEST! He took me from pretty to fire in under 1 hour! When he styled my dry cut, I felt like I was in a music video. He truly made my day & I want to go back tmrw just to see him again!

originalText.text: Tony is truly an artist with hair. He does amazing work that shows his talent. Besides being great at his job, he’s a really kind and friendly person. I highly recommend Tony.
